page.title: 03TACOLNESTON CHURCH
page.content:
{All Saints' Parish Church}has an attractive churchyard with lime trees & pines & is still in use for burials. Through the month there is a different type of service each Sunday:- prayer book Communion,morning prayer,series 3 Communion & a Family Service which is the best attended.The church is one of 7 in the Wreningham Group of Parishes, so members move round for services & activities.Pathfinders (9-14 yrs) & Church Youth Fellowship (14+) meet weekly in Ashwellthorpe.{One of the {two clergy is resident in the village.
The Church has associations with Forncett End Methodist Church through joint Sunday School,Fellowship & Prayer Groups & quarterly joint services.There are 3 other weekly Fellowship Groups meeting in or near the village.
